about_the_game:
SOLCIALISTS.OS
The ultimate Operating System for best Solcialists control experience.



MARS 2066
A RED PLANET
WE ESCAPED EARTH TO SEEK PEACEFUL LIFE ON MARS.
WE WERE VERY CAREFUL BUT SOMEHOW... THE VIRUS CAME ALONG.

IT SPREAD FAST AROUND ENTIRE MARS CIVILIZATION.
ONCE INFECTED, IT STAYS FOR LIFE.

INFECTED WENT SO FAR LEFT AND SO FAR RIGHT THAT THEY MET AT THE BOTTOM!
THEY CALL THEMSELVES:
SOLCIALISTS

THEY HAVE A LOT, THEY WANT TO HAVE IT ALL![/b]



SOLCIALISTS.OS is best described as Puzzle Strategy Simulation of extreme and woke totalitarian society.

You are a SOLCIALISTS.OS Operator.
Use Solcialists Operating System to spread propaganda and control army of mindless zombies,
so Liberators - Mars`s oligarchs - can reach their Goals... usually a Bucket of Gold.

SOLCIALISTS.OS
main features
✚ strategy - control Solcialists and find ways to satisfy Liberators.
✚ simulation - control the crowd - but remember, their number is limited.
✚ puzzles - find solutions to bring the Order!
✚ based on facts - story is based on true occurrences that took place on Earth in XX and first half of XXI century.
✚ fun and educationl gameplay
✚ easy to grasp rules and controls.
✚ physics - fun with gravity and crowd
✚ unique art style and visual effects
✚ single Player storymode campaign
✚ co-operation
and more


IF YOU WANT TO SUPPORT SOLCIALISTS.OS
MAKE SURE TO FOLLOW and WISHLIST

STAY SAFE AND DON`T GO TO FAR!

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains cartoon gore, violence and cartoon references to cruel totalitarian regimes.
